title: Theologiae Epitome
creator: Nicolai, Heinrich
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Nicolai, Heinrich: Theologiae Epitome  Methodice repraesentata, habitum Theologiae in partibus suis, Credendis & Agendis, distincte completeq[ue] delineans, & ad Calcem Theologiae Historiae per historiam Ecclesiasticam Syllogen, ab omnibus in habitu Theologiae hactenus omissam, breviter subministrans. Elbingae  Berlin
publisher: Literis Corellianis  Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Germany
